name: Fullmetal Alchemist: To the Promised Day
name_original: Fullmetal Alchemist: To the Promised Day
description: Hagane no Renkinjutsushi: Fullmetal Alchemist - Yakusoku no Hi e (鋼の錬金術師 FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST 約束の日へ) is a RPG video game published by Bandai Namco Games released on May 20th, 2010 for the PlayStation Portable.
